name: DeprecatedBatchRetrieveInventoryChanges
description:
Deprecated version of [BatchRetrieveInventoryChanges](https://developer.squareup.com/reference/square_2021-08-18/inventory-api/batch-retrieve-inventory-changes) after the endpoint URL 
is updated to conform to the standard convention.

body.description:
An object containing the fields to POST for the request.

See the corresponding object definition for field details.

$ul: **changes**: The current calculated inventory changes for the requested objects
**cursor**: The pagination cursor to be used in a subsequent request. If unset,
**errors**: Any errors that occurred during the request.
